snippet.title: Pichon Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Pichón is out on Steam!
Get it with 40% release day discount: 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/497190/Pichon/

The Steam Version will include: 
- New levels 
- Performance improvements 
- Cloud Saving 

Follow us on 
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PichonGame
- and Twitter: https://twitter.com/crimsonghostdev

Trailer Music by Kevin Milillo: https://soundcloud.com/kevinmilillo
